subject: Re: .Talk.ing to y.ou
body:
Hi there lovely,
I was searching the net few days ago. I am newa to this thing.
and saw your profile. I decided to email you cause I found 
you attractive. I might come down to your city in few weeks.
Let meb know if we can meet each other in person.
I am attractive girl. I am sure you won't regret it.
Replyb to my personal email at puuy@BounceEmail.info
